text: Charles-Marie-Photius Maurras (; ; 20 April 1868 – 16 November 1952) was a French author, politician, poet, and critic. His philosophies influenced many 20th century ideologies. ==References== Category:1868 births Category:1952 deaths Category:20th-century French philosophers Category:People from Bouches- du-Rhône Category:Martigues
title: Charles Maurras
